actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to amend section 552a of title 5, United States Code, to authorize the disclosure to Members of Congress or their designates of information regarding individuals for casework purposes.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Authorizes, under the Privacy Act of 1974, the disclosure to individual Members of Congress or their designates of information regarding individuals. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 552a)

titles.title: A bill to amend section 552a of title 5, United States Code, to authorize the disclosure to Members of Congress or their designates of information regarding individuals for casework purposes.
